two approaches one is to try to say globally across all inputs what are the
key characteristics that make this model work what does it look at how does how do the inputs to it produce the output
the other is more locally to say let me look at the point of a decision right and say at this specific point what are
the factors that this model is really incorporating to understand what's going on right so there's been a ton of
